Extracting this with phoenix works but there is no .exe to start the game?? How do you install?
Likewise, extracted with Phoenix, all the files are there except the 'System' directory files. Seems like a pre-loaded version but without the required files to actually run/crack it.

Download Phoenix (http://cs.rin.=-dot-ru/forum/viewtopic.php?f=29&t=51995&start=0)
Extract phoenix to your download folder
Extract all *.sid, *.sim, and *.sis from the ISO (put them in the download folder)
Run phoenix.exe
Goto Instruments>Update ContentDescriptionRecord>Internet
Goto Instruments>Sid Unpacker
Browse for the sim file you got from the ISO
Hit "Scan a SIM file"
Hit "Select All"
Hit "Unpack"
Goto http://cs.rin-dot-ru/forum/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=59596&start=180 for a proper crack
Extract the four files to the "System" folder

Wait for remaining files (the files containing the game engine weren't loaded on retail discs)

Frackin TPB won't let me post the instructions. Check demonoid (link in earlier comments) for instructions and download of missing files.
Works great with my method enjoy.

Download Phoenix
Extract phoenix to your download folder
Extract all *.sid, *.sim, and *.sis from the ISO (put them in a folder on desktop for use later on)
Run phoenix.exe
Goto Instruments>Update ContentDescriptionRecord>Internet
Goto Instruments>Sid Unpacker
Browse for the sim file you got from the ISO
Hit "Scan a SIM file"
Hit "Select All"
Hit "Unpack" ( To location C: "where ever you have it") (Steam-->SteamApps-->Common--CREATE FOLDER CALLED DUKE FOREVER Extract files to that location for later use)
Get crack
Extract all the files to the (Duke Forever Folder I told you about)
In the Duke Forever Folder you made Click "SYSTEM" Scroll down until you find the DukeForever.exe Right Click Create Shortcut.
Right click shortcut Hit Cut Paste Shortcut to Duke Forever Folder for easy access.
You may Logon Steam and press "Add Game" then Non-Steam game and add it to library for easier access whatever suits you.
